properties.areaDesc: Del Norte Vicinity/Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Alamosa  Vicinity/Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 1:54PM MST until February 11 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches
across the center of the valley, with 2 to 6 inches along the
valley edges.

* WHERE...Northern and Central portions of the San Luis Valley.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to noon MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult with slick and snow packed
roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning
commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST TUESDAY
